name: ClassCoder.github.io
body:
# ClassCoder likes open-source.
Whenever we can, we release our software under an open-source license such as the GPLv3 or the ISC license.

# What is open-source?
> Open source software is software that can be freely used, changed, and shared (in modified or unmodified form) by anyone. Open source software is made by many people, and distributed under [licenses](http://opensource.org/licenses) that comply with the [Open Source Definition](http://opensource.org/definition).
> 
> http://opensource.org/

# What open-source software do we have?
 - ClassHub Chrome Client
   - Repository: https://github.com/ClassCoder/classhub-client
   - Website: https://classcoder.github.io/classhub-client
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
